publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4542 Ross Finnie: Congratulations to Bishopton Primary School—That the Parliament congratulates Bishopton Primary School in Renfrewshire for its excellent HM Inspectorate of Education report; notes that Bishopton Primary received two good ratings and three very good ratings, and further notes that Bishopton Primary’s original teaching approaches such as Battle of the Bands, in which primary seven pupils learn about the music industry by forming a band and producing a music album, cover, video and publicity, were also praised in the report. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor, Hugh O’Donnell, Annabel Goldie*
